headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Rewards in Open Wheel Races
content:
Open Wheel racecars are basically missiles on wheels, vehicles trimmed of all their fat and safety precautions and let loose on tracks to do battle against each other and the forces of physics at eye-watering speeds. Slip on a helmet and jumpsuit, slide into the cockpit, and see if you can maintain control as you approach terminal velocity.

All Rockstar Created Open Wheel Races are paying out double now through December 9th, so there’s plenty of reason to ride the razor’s edge.
